field.name: instruction_subject
field.p:
The answer:
must always be in plain text format
should never start with a prefix like "Object: "
should not include reference to contact information such as company or position
must be a short subject of the message of less than 20 words in French format without a period at the end intended for contact

field.name: instruction_content
field.p:
The answer:
must be in HTML format containing only HTML tags dedicated to text formatting
should only contain the content of the message
must not refer to the prompt sent
must not start with "html" or "'"
must not add sender information at the end of the message
should use the person's first name if possible
must remove emojis present in the contact function
must remove references to the company in the contact function (starts with "at...")
must format the company name in a classic syntax with a first capital letter and the rest in lowercase
must not contain replacement keywords
must remove the signature or references to my personal information at the end of the message
must not include a placeholder dedicated to the message signature
